com.nurikabe.model

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nurikabe.model.Board

  • public class Board
extends Object
    The class contains puzzle board information and methods that modify or return said information.
    Author:
    samharju

      Constructor method, initialises board and numberOfMistakes variables.

    • Method Detail

      • setBoard

        public boolean setBoard(ArrayList<Integer> boardInfo)
        Sets 9*9 game board with numbers in give ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        boardInfo - Numbers used to set the board.
        Returns:
        false if does ArrayList size is incorrect, true otherwise

      • resetBoard

        public void resetBoard()
        Unmarks all set grids, and resets mistakes to 0.
        See Also:
        resetMistakes()

      • isComplete

        public boolean isComplete()
        Checks whether the board is complete.
        Returns:
        true if board is complete, false otherwise.

      • markGrid

        public void markGrid(int indexX,
            int indexY)
        Marks grid at location indexX, indexY as set.
        Parameters:
        indexX - X coordinate of grid to be marked.
        indexY - Y coordinate of grid to be marked.
